title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button to create a JAR file, the JAR packager reports the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'. This occurs even after ensuring that all open files are saved properly.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late.
EB: The JAR packager should report open files at an earlier stage to allow users to save any unsaved changes before creating the JAR file.
SR: Improve the timing of the JAR packager notifications to ensure that open files are reported before the 'Finish' button is pressed. Additionally, provide a warning or prompt for users to save any unsaved changes before proceeding with JAR file creation.
